Series.Actors: |Timothy Olyphant|Walton Goggins|Natalie Zea|Jacob Pitts|Joelle Carter|Nick Searcy|Jere Burns|David Meunier|Jim Beaver|Neal McDonough|Margo Martindale|Raymond J. Barry|Erica N. Tazel|
Series.Overview: Deputy U.S. Marshal Raylan Givens is something of a 19th century-style officer in modern times, whose unconventional enforcement of justice makes him a target with criminals and a problem for his superiors in the U.S. Marshals Service. As a result of an eager but "justified" shooting of a Miami fugitive while on assignment in Florida, Givens is reassigned to Lexington, Kentucky, in a district that includes his hometown of Harlan, a rural mining town in the east of the state.

Episode.GuestStars: Joelle Carter|Natalie Zea|Damon Herriman|Matt Craven|Peter Greene|Doug E. Doug|Kevin Rankin|Ryan O'Nan|Joel Garland|Daniel Stewart Sherman|Walton Goggins
Episode.Overview: Gunslinging U.S. Marshal Raylan Givens faces off against his oldest friend in Harlan, Kentucky, a 21st Century Wild West.

Episode.GuestStars: Kristin Bauer van Straten|Chris Ellis|Damon Herriman|Johnny Sneed|Myk Watford|Bill Glass|Colleen McGrann|Walton Goggins
Episode.Overview: Raylan hunts an escaped prisoner who is determined to reunite with his ex-wife...and his stashed fortune.

Episode.GuestStars: David Eigenberg|Greg Cromer|Page Kennedy|Erin Cardillo|Jessica Camacho
Episode.Overview: In tracking a vanished confidential informant, Raylan goes against a pair of violent ex-cons who are just dying for a showdown with "The Kentucky Cowboy."

Episode.GuestStars: Alan Ruck|Michele Nordin|Lance Barber|Brian Goodman|Brandon Keener|David Warshofsky|Clarence Williams III
Episode.Overview: Raylan leaves to California to follow the trails of a criminal who has evaded him twice in the past, and Raylan is determined that the third time won't be the same.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Lord of War and Thunder
Episode.GuestStars: Linda Gehringer|Rick Gomez|Eddie Jemison|Brent Sexton|Karina Logue|David Meunier|Raymond J. Barry
Episode.Overview: Raylan's father is arrested in the wake of a confrontation with the tenant of a house he and Raylan's stepmother own.

Episode.GuestStars: Katherine LaNasa|Brett Cullen|Rick Gomez|Tony Hale|Peter Jason|Robert Picardo|William Ragsdale|Walton Goggins
Episode.Overview: After an apparent suicide on an opulent Kentucky horse farm, Raylan must resist the sexy widow as he searches for the dead man's missing art.

Episode.GuestStars: M.C. Gainey|Linda Gehringer|James Immekus|Ray McKinnon|David Meunier|Brent Sexton|Walton Goggins
Episode.Overview: Raylan foils an attempt on Ava's life and vows to find out who was behind it. Later, Raylan finds out that Ava may not have been the target.

Episode.GuestStars: W. Earl Brown|Jere Burns|M.C. Gainey|Rick Gomez|Fredric Lehne|William Ragsdale|Walton Goggins
Episode.Overview: When a murderous inmate takes hostages, Raylan must scramble to defuse the situation before the bullets start flying.

Episode.GuestStars: Malik Yoba|Jere Burns|David Eigenberg|Steven Flynn|Tom Kiesche|William Ragsdale|Travis Wester
Episode.Overview: Raylan has a few drinks and gets himself beaten up, after being suspended as a Marshall. He pulls himself together and decides to jeopardise his career further by going after the thugs who have been harassing his ex-wife's new husband.

Episode.GuestStars: Stephen Root|Doug E. Doug|Jenni Blong|Sean Bridgers|Brad Carter|Darin Heames|David Meunier|Walton Goggins
Episode.Overview: Determined to repair the damage he's done, Raylan takes time away from his assignment bodyguarding an eccentric judge to track down an old lead.

Episode.GuestStars: Raymond J. Barry|M.C. Gainey|Linda Gehringer|Jim Haynie|Damon Herriman|Brent Sexton|Kevin E. West|Brad Carter|David Meunier|Ray Porter|Walton Goggins
Episode.Overview: When Boyd Crowder and his crusaders become vigilantes, Raylan takes it upon himself to try to shut them down.

Episode.GuestStars: Raymond J. Barry|Alexandra Barreto|Jordi Caballero|Mo Gaffney|M.C. Gainey|Linda Gehringer|Rick Gomez|William Ragsdale|David Meunier|Ray Porter|Omar Avila|Joshua Bitton|Pat Skipper|Walton Goggins
Episode.Overview: In order to work for the Marshal's Office, Raylan's dad Arlo agrees to become a double agent and work for Bo Crowder. Meanwhile, Bo sets up a meth lab to get back in business.

Episode.GuestStars: Raymond J. Barry|Alexandra Barreto|M.C. Gainey|Omar Avila|David Meunier|Ray Porter|Walton Goggins
Episode.Overview: In the season finale, things come to a head in Harlan when the worlds of Raylan, Boyd and Bo Crowder collide.

Episode.GuestStars: Margo Martindale|Jeremy Davies|Alexandra Barreto|Jordi Caballero|Matt Craven|Kaitlyn Dever|Brad William Henke|Chris Mulkey|Joseph Lyle Taylor|Billy Miller|Peter Murnik
Episode.Overview: Raylan tangles with a ruthless Harlan County crime family while hunting for a fugitive sex offender.

Episode.GuestStars: Linda Gehringer|Jeremy Davies|Margo Martindale|Kaitlyn Dever|Brad William Henke|Sarah Jones|James Jordan|Kai Lennox|Chris Mulkey|William Ragsdale|Christie Lynn Smith|David Sullivan|Joseph Lyle Taylor|Raymond J. Barry
Episode.Overview: Raylan chases a pregnant fugitive who has fallen into the hands of human traffickers.

Episode.GuestStars: Jeremy Davies|Will Harris|Brad William Henke|Damon Herriman|Michael Mosley|Peter Murnik|Channon Roe|Joseph Lyle Taylor
Episode.Overview: The hijacking of a bus full of drugs ends in murder, and Raylan pursues the likely culprit: Boyd Crowder.

Episode.GuestStars: Margo Martindale|Jeremy Davies|Chadwick Boseman|Kaitlyn Dever|Jakobe' Dempsey|Steven Flynn|Brad William Henke|Juanita Jennings|Joel McCrary|Michael Mosley|William Ragsdale|Joseph Lyle Taylor|Larenz Tate
Episode.Overview: When Rachel's brother-in-law makes a violent escape from a halfway house, Raylan is forced to hunt him down. Boyd entertains a dangerous offer in Harlan.

Episode.GuestStars: Margo Martindale|Jeremy Davies|Jim Beaver|Kaitlyn Dever|Linda Gehringer|Brad William Henke|Damon Herriman|Michael Mosley|Peter Murnik|Joseph Lyle Taylor|Michael Shamus Wiles|Alex Solowitz|Nathan Sutton|Raymond J. Barry
Episode.Overview: Raylan's hunt for a killer puts him on a collision course with the Bennett clan, while Boyd plots a heist with treacherous new partners.

Episode.GuestStars: William Ragsdale|Ronnie Gene Blevins|Chris Coy|Conor O'Farrell|Connie Ray|Scott Wilson
Episode.Overview: When a terminally ill ex-con is linked to a bank heist, Art and Raylan must find him before he and his young henchmen can strike again. However, the manhunt is complicated when Winona worries that a hundred-dollar bill she took from an evidence room locker will be traced back to her after it is taken in the robbery.

Episode.GuestStars: Stephen Root|Jere Burns|William Ragsdale|Tara Buck|Karen Landry|Rebecca Creskoff
Episode.Overview: Winona's blunder could put her behind bars, unless Raylan can weave his way through a federal courthouse locked down over death threats.

Episode.GuestStars: Rebecca Creskoff|Margo Martindale|Jeremy Davies|Tara Buck|Kaitlyn Dever|Linda Gehringer|Brad William Henke|Peter Murnik|Joseph Lyle Taylor|Raymond J. Barry
Episode.Overview: Raylan must protect a cunning coal executive who is out of her element when negotiating with the powerful Bennett clan.

Episode.GuestStars: Margo Martindale|Jeremy Davies|Kaitlyn Dever|Brad William Henke|Joseph Lyle Taylor|Mark Colson|Peter Murnik|Rebecca Creskoff
Episode.Overview: Just as the bad blood between the Bennetts and the coal company threatens to boil over, Raylan must thwart one of Mags' sons.

Episode.GuestStars: Margo Martindale|Mark Colson|Jeremy Davies|Kaitlyn Dever|Linda Gehringer|David Meunier|William Ragsdale|Kevin Rankin|Richard Speight Jr.|Joseph Lyle Taylor
Episode.Overview: Raylan and Winona's idyll is shattered by violence, as Boyd and the Bennetts struggle to rise from the ashes of chaos in Harlan.

Episode.GuestStars: Margo Martindale|Jeremy Davies|Jere Burns|Matt Craven|Linda Gehringer|Mickey Jones|David Meunier|William Ragsdale|Kevin Rankin|Richard Speight Jr.|Joseph Lyle Taylor|Raymond J. Barry
Episode.Overview: Raylan realizes he wasn't the sole target of an attempted assassination, and confronts the unlikely culprit once and for all.

Episode.GuestStars: Margo Martindale|Jeremy Davies|Kaitlyn Dever|David Meunier|Peter Murnik|Kevin Rankin|Richard Speight Jr.|Joseph Lyle Taylor|Raymond J. Barry
Episode.Overview: A deadly home invasion hits Raylan personally, placing him in a race with Boyd and Arlo to find the killer. Mags is forced to make decisions about her involvement in the Bennett family's criminal activities and the fate of Dickie, who has a deadly plan to absolve himself of responsibility.

Episode.GuestStars: Margo Martindale|Jeremy Davies|Kaitlyn Dever|James Le Gros|David Meunier|Peter Murnik|Kevin Rankin|Joseph Lyle Taylor|Raymond J. Barry
Episode.Overview: The Crowder and the Bennett clans go to war over control of Harlan, a move that leaves dead and dying on both sides.
The arrival of a Detroit mobster in Lexington puts Raylan on a collision course with a sadistic Dixie Mafia hit man. Raylan also has another altercation with Boyd.

The murder of a fellow marshal throws Raylan together with a former female colleague, and Art leaves the office to track down another angle of the case. Meanwhile, Boyd engineers a showdown with Dickie Bennett, despite Raylan's effort to prevent it.

Raylan faces off with a tyrannical Oxy dealer, putting him on a collision course with the new head of the Dixie Mafia. Meanwhile, Boyd fights to regain part of his family's empire, but his methods could rip his crew apart.
A daring prison escape puts Raylan on the trail of two old foes. Meanwhile, Boyd confronts a traitor in his inner circle.
Raylan races to save Dewey Crowe from a gang of vicious organ harvesters. Boyd faces off with a new adversary.
As Boyd fights for control of the Harlan oxy trade, Raylan works to keep the battle from becoming an all-out war while also battling a personal issue.
Raylan's tactics put him at odds with the FBI as he intensifies his efforts to take down Quarles and the Detroit mob.
A shocking murder forces Raylan to face past mistakes. Meanwhile, Boyd goes up against Harlan's corrupt sheriff.
Raylan pursues a Dixie Mafia soldier who could be the key to nabbing Quarles; Ava protects an imperiled prostitute by any means necessary.

Episode.GuestStars: Mykelti Williamson|Jeremy Davies|Jere Burns|Marshall Allman|David Andrews|Jim Beaver|Rick Gomez|David Meunier|Stephen Root|Richard Speight Jr.|Demetrius Grosse|William Gregory Lee|Jenn Lyon|Neal McDonough
Episode.Overview: Raylan struggles to keep Dickie Bennett in prison while contending with an increasingly violent and unpredictable Quarles.

Episode.GuestStars: Raymond J. Barry|Jeremy Davies|Jere Burns|Marshall Allman|David Andrews|Adam Arkin|Michael Ironside|David Meunier|Demetrius Grosse|Mickey Jones|Jenn Lyon|Abby Miller|Chris Tardio|Clay Wilcox|Mykelti Williamson|Neal McDonough
Episode.Overview: Raylan squares off with a pair of merciless Detroit hit men. The battle between Boyd and Quarles comes to a head.

Episode.GuestStars: Raymond J. Barry|Jeremy Davies|Jere Burns|David Andrews|Kaitlyn Dever|Gill Gayle|Linda Gehringer|David Meunier|Demetrius Grosse|Cleavon McClendon|Peter Murnik|Mykelti Williamson|Neal McDonough
Episode.Overview: While Raylan closes in on an ever-more-unpredictable Quarles, Boyd enters into an unlikely alliance with Dickie Bennett in a last-ditch attempt to recover Mags's fortune.

Episode.GuestStars: Raymond J. Barry|Jere Burns|Adam Arkin|Jim Beaver|Demetrius Grosse|David Meunier|Cathy Cahlin Ryan|David Carpenter|Cleavon McClendon|Abby Miller|Tyler Neitzel|Mykelti Williamson|Neal McDonough
Episode.Overview: After the murder of his friend, Raylan is a man on fire as he goes after any- and everyone he holds responsible on the way to a bloody final showdown.

Episode.GuestStars: Patton Oswalt|Casey Brown|Aja Evans|Alexandra Kyle|Howard S. Miller|Terry Dale Parks|
Episode.Overview: Raylan turns to affable but inexperienced Constable Bob for help securing a bail jumper from Tennessee, and finds evidence his family is at the center of a legendary unsolved mystery.

Episode.GuestStars: Ron Eldard|Joseph Mazzello|Robert Baker|Joshua Close|Dave Florek|Beth Grant|Jenn Lyon|Abby Miller|Lindsay Pulsipher|Don Harvey|Ethan Jamieson|Ted Welch|Jesse Luken|Jonathan Kowalsky|Jessa French|
Episode.Overview: As Raylan tangles with a dangerous family keeping a dark secret, Boyd takes on a snake-handling preacher.

Episode.GuestStars: Ron Eldard|Julia Campbell|LaMonica Garrett|Joseph Mazzello|Lindsay Pulsipher|Caileigh Scott|Scot Zeller|
Episode.Overview: Drew Thompson's widow turns up and gets Raylan in hot water with the FBI, while Boyd's strike at the snake church is met with a surprising strike back.

Episode.GuestStars: Robert Baker|David Dean Bottrell|Joshua Close|Jenn Lyon|Lindsay Pulsipher|Paul Rae|Navi Rawat|
Episode.Overview: Raylan's hunt for his stolen money leads to a confrontation with a bareknuckle brawler; while Boyd and Ava face a decision that threatens to destroy them.

Episode.GuestStars: Cathy Baron|Ron Eldard|Rick Gomez|Azmyth Kaminski|Alexandra Kyle|Abby Miller|Mike O'Malley|Patton Oswalt|Lindsay Pulsipher|Christopher Douglas Reed|Gerald McRaney|Stephen Tobolowsky|
Episode.Overview: The search for Drew Thompson leads Raylan into the remote wilds of Kentucky hill country with unexpected and dangerous results.

Episode.GuestStars: Cathy Baron|Joseph Barone|Dakota Black|Kevin Brief|Casey Brown|Ron Eldard|Billy Finnigan|Alexandra Kyle|Gerald McRaney|Lindsay Pulsipher|Romy Rosemont|
Episode.Overview: Raylan's discovery of a severed foot sets off a race against time, while Boyd and Ava work to break into Harlan high society.

Episode.GuestStars: Ron Eldard|Sam Anderson|David Andrews|Cathy Baron|Chris Chalk|Aja Evans|Shelley Hennig|Lindsay Pulsipher|
Episode.Overview: Raylan finds himself caught between a foxy grifter and an old nemesis out for revenge, while Boyd and Ava come face-to-face with the decadence of Harlan's elite.

Episode.GuestStars: Ron Eldard|Sam Anderson|Ned Bellamy|Julia Campbell|Grainger Hines|Abby Miller|Mike O'Malley|
Episode.Overview: Bodies start dropping and no one is safe as the search for Drew Thompson enters its home stretch.

Episode.GuestStars: Patton Oswalt|Brent Sexton|Cathy Baron|Ron Eldard|Mel Fair|Abby Miller|
Episode.Overview: Boyd discovers he still has an Ellen-May problem, while Raylan goes off-book to do some dynamite-fishing with unexpected results.

Episode.GuestStars: Cathy Baron|Ron Eldard|Abby Miller|Mike O'Malley|Mykelti Williamson|
Episode.Overview: Drew Thompson slips through the fingers of Raylan, Boyd, and the Detroit mob, and sets off a breakneck race to find him.

Episode.GuestStars: Ron Eldard|Mike O'Malley|David Landry|Chet Grissom|Patton Oswalt|
Episode.Overview: Boyd and the gang from Detroit Mob use dirty tricks to keep Raylan and Drew Thompson alive.

Episode.GuestStars: Cathy Baron|Daniel Buran|Ron Eldard|Mel Fair|Abby Miller|Lindsay Pulsipher|Mykelti Williamson|Rick Gomez|Mike O'Malley|
Episode.Overview: The Drew Thompson case becomes a fiasco that Raylan can fix only by besting Boyd in a hunt for the unwitting woman caught in the middle.

Episode.GuestStars: Abby Miller|Lindsay Pulsipher|Troy Ruptash|Mykelti Williamson|
Episode.Overview: Raylan has a last, lethal showdown with the Detroit mob, while Boyd and Ava try to keep an incriminating secret dead and buried.
